title: [Untamed Spirit, Shrine]
description: Little light filters into this tiny alcove, making the only illumination the various blue-flamed candles set into various nooks along the uneven walls.  There is not much room for anything besides a squat stone shrine, which stretches across the entire space.  Abandoned offerings of feathers and animal bones litter the floor, creating a narrow pathway of treacherous footing.  The overwhelming scent of mold, mixed with a faint aroma of incense, permeates the damp air.
